value:
$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|The tournament will soon draw to a
close. The next battle will determine
the champion.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|I've been thinking, Alfonse... How
is it that we can meet that other
Alfonse and Sharena here?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I've been wondering the same thing!
How is it possible?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Our world is connected to countless
other realms...$k$pIn some of them, the Great Hero
is called $Nu.$k$pAnd in some of them, it's something
else entirely...$k$pThere are realms where we dress up
for the spring festival. Happily, mine
is not one of them.$k$pThe possibilities are endless...$k$pWith realms sprawling infinitely...and
limitless time...you could even
say—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Got it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you certain? I'm happy to explain
further.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|... I have a feeling our realms aren't
so far apart, in the end.$k$pBut the time for talk is over! It's time
for all the descendents of Askr to
join the fight!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|That's enough! I must say, other
Sharena...you did very well!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Thank you! I think that you did very
well yourself.$k$pYou're strong, and your costume is so
adorable!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Thank you! I especially love the ears,
don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I do! I think our taste must be very
similar.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I guess that makes sense—you're
me, and I'm you!$k$pHa-ha!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Ha-ha!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|Those two are getting along well,
aren't they?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So they are. I hope you don't mind my
saying this, but it seems you have...
a lot to put up with.$k$pThose clothes...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|You do understand, don't you? It's a
relief to talk to somebody who really...
gets it.$k$pI guess it's not just the Sharenas who
make a pair, is it? Now that I think
about it, I could use some advice...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Of course! There are plenty of
subjects I'd like another perspective
on, too. Who better to ask?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Come on, Alfonse! Before it gets too
late, let's take a look around the
festival grounds...$k$pOr as my super bun-bun pal Sharena
might say... Let's hop to it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|She might. I wouldn't. But, yes, you're
right... Let's see what there is to see!$k$p$Sbs150|
